const std::string sot::Selector::CLASS_NAME [static]
std::vector< std::vector<dg::SignalBase<int>* > > sot::Selector::inputsSIN
unsigned int sot::Selector::nbEntries [protected]

Number of possible values for the selector.

For each entry, you have one signal of each type.

unsigned int sot::Selector::nbSignals [protected]

Number of signal type.

For each signal type, you have one output and <nbEntries> inputs.
